data.title: A Tribute To The Many Faces Of Tyler Hansbrough
data.meta_description: Indiana Pacers forward Tyler Hansbrough is the prototypical love him or hate him player. He’s...
data.text:
Indiana Pacers forward Tyler Hansbrough is the prototypical love him or hate him player. He’s energetic, intense and borderline obnoxious on the court, so fans of the team he plays for love him and those he plays against hate him. In the Pacers’ first round series against the Orlando Magic alone, he showed that even though his numbers are low coming off the bench, he contributes best by getting into opponents’ heads and causing them to make mistakes. (With Leather)
